name: European Liaison Committee for Agriculture and agri-food trade
membership: CELCAA est membre de la FAIB (Fédération des Associations Internationales Basées en belgique). www.faib.be
goal:
CELCAA is the European Umbrella representing the profession of trade in agri-commodities and agri-food products to the EU institutions, stakeholders and media.
CELCAA acts as a platform of exchange between its members, and has the role to educate the EU decision-makers about the role of the trade in the economy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: CELCAA is following free trade negotiations, in particular the  implementation of EU - Canada CETA agreement, EU-Japan and FTA negotiations such as EU-Mercosur etc. CELCAA is also following all regulatory development covering food, such as official controls; Food Information for Consumers. In addition, CELCAA is interested in Customs matters and transport and logistics issues.
